member.name: M:VectorDraw.Professional.vdCommandLine.vdCommandLine.PostExecuteCommand(System.String)
member.summary: This ExecuteCommand Posts the Execution of the command as aoon as the Message que of the application is ready to translate the message.
member.param: A string representing the command.
member.remarks: This is very usefull with buttons that lock the focus until the click event is finished(like ToolStripItem).

member.summary: Get/Set the font used to display the commands to the popup form.

member.name: P:VectorDraw.Professional.vdCommandLine.vdCommandLine.PopuphighlightColor
member.summary: Get/Set the color used as highlight color of the popup form.

member.name: P:VectorDraw.Professional.vdCommandLine.vdCommandLine.PopupBackColor
member.summary: Get/Set the color used as background to the popup form.

member.name: P:VectorDraw.Professional.vdCommandLine.vdCommandLine.PopupFormWidth
member.summary: Get/Set an integer value that represents the width of the popup form.If the value is less than 1 then the form calculates the value so all commands are shown.

member.name: P:VectorDraw.Professional.vdCommandLine.vdCommandLine.MaxNumberOfCommandsShown
member.summary: Get/Set an integer value that represents the number of commands shown to the popup form. This value must be a positive number greater than 2.

member.name: P:VectorDraw.Professional.vdCommandLine.vdCommandLine.PopupFormShowIcons
member.summary: Get/Set a boolean value that represents if icons are going to be displayed while veing the commands to the popup form.

member.name: P:VectorDraw.Professional.vdCommandLine.vdCommandLine.ShowPopupFormPerigram
member.summary: Get/Set a boolean value that represents if while showing the popup form the form will show it's perigram or only the list will be shown.

member.name: P:VectorDraw.Professional.vdCommandLine.vdCommandLine.EnablePopupForm
member.summary: Get/Set a boolean value representing if the popup form will be shown.
member.remarks: Default value is true. Set it to False in order to disable this feature.

member.name: P:VectorDraw.Professional.vdCommandLine.vdCommandLine.PopupFormShowBelow
member.summary: Represents a boolean value that if true shows the popup form below the commandLine, usefull when the commandline is in the upper section of the application.
